title: the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) shall come into
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021 

(Tosach Feidhme) (Uimh. 2), 2023 a ghairm den Ordú seo.

title: the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) shall come into
heading: 2. Ceaptar an 5ú lá de Bhealtaine 2023 mar an lá a thiocfaidh alt 3 d’Acht
text_raw:
2. Ceaptar an 5ú lá de Bhealtaine 2023 mar an lá a thiocfaidh alt 3 d’Acht 

na dTeangacha Oifigiúla (Leasú), 2021 (Uimh. 49 de 2021) i ngníomh. 

ARNA THABHAIRT faoi mo Shéala Oifigiúil, 

4 Bealtaine , 2023. 

CATHERINE MARTIN, 

Aire Turasóireachta, Cultúir, Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt 
agus Meán. 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 5 Bealtaine, 2023, á rá go 
ndearnadh an Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

[215] 3 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 215 of 2023 

________________ 

OFFICIAL LANGUAGES (AMENDMENT) ACT 2021 
(COMMENCEMENT) (NO. 2) ORDER 2023 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [215] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 215 of 2023 

OFFICIAL LANGUAGES (AMENDMENT) ACT 2021 
(COMMENCEMENT) (NO. 2) ORDER 2023 

I, CATHERINE MARTIN, Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport 
and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 20(3) of the 
Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021), hereby order as 
follows:

title: the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) shall come into
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Official Languages (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 

2021 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited official language (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) (no 2) order 2023

title: the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) shall come into
heading: 2. The 5th day of May 2023 is appointed as the day on which section 3 of
text_raw:
2. The 5th day of May 2023 is appointed as the day on which section 3 of 
the Official Languages (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 49 of 2021) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 May, 2023. 

CATHERINE MARTIN, 

Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th May, 2023.
